title: What font is used in logo
content:
Hi!  
Can anybody help me identifying this font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001322im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BC_logo_5755.JPG)

I found second line is "Lekton" font; any ideas on the other font (or is it custom?)? Thank you for your help!
author: Maas
